references.reason: This paper introduces the Transformer architecture, which is a fundamental building block for many modern deep learning models, including those used in video generation and adaptation with cross-attention.
This paper presents a foundational approach for diffusion models, which are a popular class of generative models used for video generation in this study.
This paper is important as the method of classifier-free diffusion guidance is widely used to improve the quality and prompt alignment of generated content with diffusion models.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, a class of diffusion models used for high-resolution image and video generation, which is relevant to this study.

references.paper_title: wav2vec 2.0: A framework for self-supervised learning of speech representations
references.reason: This paper provides an audio encoder architecture named Wav2Vec 2.0, which is used in the MusicInfuser to extract temporal and spectral features from the input audio.
